definition: until death puts an end (idiom); one's whole life/unto one's dying day

to bend to a task and spare no effort unto one's dying day (idiom); striving to the utmost one's whole life/with every breath in one's body, unto one's dying day

sentences.english: He really gave his all till his heart ceased to beat.
sentences.chinese: 他真是鞠躬尽瘁，死而后已。
